title: DPS-BEST OF-for Aug 27, 2020
itunes:title: DPS-BEST OF-for Aug 27, 2020
description:
On Today's DP Show, Dan recaps the players decision to boycott Playoff games in the NBA bubble. Former NBA Player/Turner Sports Analyst Jim Jackson, Mike Florio of Pro Football Talk and Sports Illustrated's NBA insider Chris Mannix join the program. Plus DP gives an inside look on what it's like broadcasting during events outside of the game you're covering.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
